thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 14 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Bristol-Myers must produce additional discovery in Abilify MDL: judge

author: Tina Bellon
title: Bristol-Myers must produce additional discovery in Abilify MDL: judge
text:
Bristol-Myers Squibb will have to produce additional discovery requested by plaintiffs in the multidistrict litigation over antipsychotic drug Abilify, a judge ordered on Tuesday.
The order by U.S. Magistrate Judge Gary Jones in Gainesville, Florida comes a day after plaintiffs asked that sanctions be imposed on the company over its alleged obstruction of the discovery process.
To read the full story on Westlaw Practitioner Insights, click here: bit.ly/2BXu62w
